title: 09/20/2021 - HOUR 1 - Lamar, Chargers, Tua, Carr
itunes:title: 09/20/2021 - HOUR 1 - Lamar, Chargers, Tua, Carr
description:
Lamar Jackson was able to control the time of possession

The Chargers made too many mistakes against the Cowboys

The Dolphins will continue to have problems until they get the QB position right

Derek Carr has been fantastic this season


Guest: Joe Thomas
